server_error_message: Please check your internet connection and try again.
email_already_in_use_message: That email address is already in use. Try logging in or use a different email address.
invalid_email_and_password_combination_m: Wrong email address and password combination. Try again.
verify_anonymous_login_text:
Signing up unlocks all the features of Sepetim app. You can skip the registration now and register later.

Signing up ensures that your data is stored securely on the cloud so you can access it on any Android mobile device with your account.

If you uninstall the app before the registration, your data will be lost.
title: Title
title_exceeding_length: Title can't be longer than 40 characters
title_multiline: Title can't include more than a line
delete_category_message: Are you sure to delete this category? It's groups and items will be deleted as well. This action can't be undone.
please_report: An unexpected error has occured. Please report us by sending email to tanyildizi.resul@gmail.com
delete_group_message: Are you sure to delete this group? It's items will be deleted as well. This action can't be undone.
description_exceeding_length: Description can't be longer than 1000 characters
delete_item_message: Are you sure to delete this item? This action can't be undone.
invalid_url: Invalid url. Url must start with http:// or https://
discard_changes_message: Are you sure to discard the changes?
link_adding_limit_message: Sorry, it's not possible to add more than 5 links for an item
delete_link_message: Are you sure to delete this link?
delete_account_title: Are you sure to delete your account permanently?
delete_account_message: If you delete your account, your data will be deleted as well. This action can't be undone.
